name: Mineral Engine Oils
description: Formulated for older and less demanding engines. Offers reliable lubrication and protection. Cost-effective solution for various engines.
benefits: Dependable Lubrication: Consistent performance and protection.
Engine Protection: Protects against wear and corrosion.
Cost-Effective: An economical choice for routine maintenance.

name: Turbo Diesel Engine Oils
description: Specifically formulated for turbocharged diesel engines. Provides robust performance and protection under high stress.
benefits: Soot Handling: Advanced formula manages soot, reducing engine deposits.
Wear Protection: Enhanced protection for critical engine parts.
Oxidation Stability: Resists oil thickening and degradation.
Engine Longevity: Prolongs engine life by maintaining performance under heavy loads.

name: High Performance Greases
description: Suitable for various industrial and automotive applications. Provides reliable lubrication and protection in demanding environments.
benefits: Load-Carrying Capacity: Handles heavy loads with ease.
Water Resistance: Excellent resistance to water washout, ensuring long-lasting protection.
Mechanical Stability: Superior mechanical stability in high-shear conditions.
Temperature Range: Operates effectively across a wide temperature range.
